StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetRefData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@edipi varchar(10) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @result varchar(max) DECLARE @tempJson varchar(max)
--RssOss.[dbo].[RCTAPI_GetRefData] 1266694055 --DECLARE @edipi varchar(10) --SET @edipi = 1266694055
DECLARE @nowMinusOneYear date
SET @nowMinusOneYear = DATEADD(year, -1, GETDATE())
-- Recruiter Info SELECT TOP 1 u.FirstName ,u.LastName ,rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID AS Recrui.ngPersonId ,rp.rowguid AS Recrui.ngPersonGuid ,ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ,ro.rowguid as OrgGuid ,ro.COUNTY_CODE ,ro.STATE_CODE ,ro.CITY_CODE ,ro.Street ,ro.Street2 ,ro.ZIP_CODE INTO #Recruiter FROM UserMgmt.dbo.[User] u INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p ON u.FirstName = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.LastName=p.LAST_NAME INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = ro.OrgUnitId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Dis.nguishedName like '%' + @edipi AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY LastAc.vityDate DESC
--drugTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DrugTypeId AS drugTypeId ,DrugTypeDisposi.on AS drugTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.DrugType FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('drugTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = ISNULL(@tempJson, '"drugTypes":[]')
--commentTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectCommentTypeId AS commentTypeId ,ProspectCommentType AS commentTypeCode ,ProspectCommentDescrip.on AS commentTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('commentTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"commentTypes":[]')
--ac.vityComments SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectAc.vityCommentId AS ac.vityCommentId ,Ac.vity AS recrui.ngAc.vityCode ,ProspectCommentTypeId AS commentTypeId --,IsEnlisted AS ,SortOrder AS sortOrder FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('ac.vityComments'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"ac.vityComments":[]')
--recrui.ngAc.vi.es SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ACTIVITY_CODE AS recrui.ngAc.vityCode ,ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION AS recrui.ngAc.vityName ,TYPE AS candidateType FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ACTIVITY
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('recrui.ngAc.vi.es'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"recrui.ngAc.vi.es":[]')
--recrui.ngSources SET @tempJson = ( SELECT SOURCE_CODE AS recrui.ngSourceCode ,SOURCE_DESCRIPTION AS recrui.ngSourceName ,TYPE AS candidateType ,CASE WHEN ACTIVE = 'Y' THEN CAST(1 AS bit) ELSE CAST(0 AS bit) END AS isAc.ve FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_SOURCE
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('recrui.ngSources'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"recrui.ngSources":[]')
--ethnici.es SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ETHNIC_CODE AS ethnicityCode ,ETHNIC_ABBREVEATION AS ethnicityAbbrevia.on ,ETHNIC_SHRT_DESCRIPTION AS ethnicityShortName ,ETHNIC_LONG_DESCRIPTION AS ethnicityLongName FROM MCRISS.dbo.ETHNIC
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('ethnici.es'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"ethnici.es":[]')
--races SET @tempJson = ( SELECT RACE_CODE AS raceCode ,RACE_DESC AS raceName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RACE WHERE RACE_CODE <> 'F' --'DECLINED TO RESPOND'
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('races'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"races":[]')
--mepcomEthnici.es SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ETHNIC_CATEGORY_CODE AS mepcomEthnicityCode ,ETHNIC_CATEGORY_DESC AS mepcomEthnicityName
,IsAc.ve AS isAc.ve FROM MCRISS.dbo.MEPCOM_ETHNIC_CATEGORY
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('mepcomEthnici.es'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"mepcomEthnici.es":[]')
--mepcomRaces SET @tempJson = ( SELECT RACE_CATEGORY_CODE AS mepcomRaceCode ,RACE_CATEGORY_DESC AS mepcomRaceName FROM MCRISS.dbo.MEPCOM_RACE_CATEGORY
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('mepcomRaces'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"mepcomRaces":[]')
--religions SET @tempJson = ( SELECT RELIGION_CODE AS religionCode ,RELIGION_CODE_DESC AS religionName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RELIGION
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('religions'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"religions":[]')
--ci.zenshipTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT CITIZENSHIP_CODE AS ci.zenshipTypeCode ,CITIZENSHIP_DESCRIPTION AS ci.zenshipTypeName FROM MCRISS.dbo.CITIZENSHIP
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('ci.zenshipTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"ci.zenshipTypes":[]')
--educa.onCreden.als SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Code AS educa.onCreden.alCode ,Descrip.on AS educa.onCreden.alName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Educa.onCreden.al
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onCreden.als'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onCreden.als":[]')
--educa.onLevels SET @tempJson = ( SELECT EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE AS educa.onLevelCode ,EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION AS educa.onLevelName ,SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder FROM MCRISS.dbo.EDUCATION_LEVEL
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onLevels'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onLevels":[]')
--educa.onCer..ca.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT EDUCATION_CODE AS educa.onCer..ca.onCode ,EDUCATION_CODE_DESCRIPTION AS educa.onCer..ca.onName
FROM MCRISS.dbo.EDUCATION_CODE WHERE EDUCATION_CODE <> '2' --MIGRATION PROBLEMS
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onCer..ca.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onCer..ca.ons":[]')
--educa.onStatuses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Code AS educa.onStatusCode ,Descrip.on AS educa.onStatusName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Educa.onStatus
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onStatuses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onStatuses":[]')
--o.enseTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT LegalO.enseTypeId AS o.enseTypeId ,Descrip.on AS o.enseTypeName FROM MCRISS.USMC.LegalO.enseType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('o.enseTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"o.enseTypes":[]')
--o.enses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT LegalO.enseId AS o.enseId ,LegalO.enseTypeId AS o.enseTypeId ,Descrip.on AS o.enseName FROM MCRISS.USMC.LegalO.ense
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('o.enses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"o.enses":[]')
--dependentTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DEPENDENT_TYPE AS dependentTypeCode ,DEPENDENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION AS dependentTypeName FROM MCRISS.dbo.DEPENDENT
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('dependentTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"dependentTypes":[]')
--serviceCharacters SET @tempJson = ( SELECT SERVICE_CHARACTER AS serviceCharacterCode ,SERVICE_CHARACTER_SHORT AS serviceCharacterShortName ,SERVICE_CHARACTER_DESC AS serviceCharacterLongName FROM MCRISS.dbo.SERVICE_CHARACTER
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('serviceCharacters'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"serviceCharacters":[]')
--services SET @tempJson = ( SELECT SERVICE_ID AS serviceId ,SERVICE_CODE AS serviceCode ,SERVICE AS serviceName FROM MCRISS.dbo.SERVICE
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('services'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"services":[]')
--reenlistments SET @tempJson = ( SELECT REENLISTMENT_CODE AS reenlistmentCode ,REENLISTMENT_DESC AS reenlistmentName FROM MCRISS.dbo.REENLISTMENT
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('reenlistments'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"reenlistments":[]')
--separa.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DISCHARGE_CODE AS separa.onCode ,DISCHARGE_REASON AS separa.onName ,DISCHARGE_TYPE AS separa.onType ,TYPE AS candidateType FROM MCRISS.dbo.DISCHARGE_REASON WHERE [TYPE] IS NOT NULL
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('separa.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"separa.ons":[]')
--eventSources SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventSourceId ,Name AS eventSourceName ,EventSourceTypeId AS eventSourceTypeId ,IsCard AS isCard FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSource
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventSources'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventSources":[]')
--eventSourceTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventSourceTypeId ,Name AS eventSourceTypeName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventSourceType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventSourceTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventSourceTypes":[]')
--eventTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventTypeId ,Type AS eventTypeName ,EventSourceId AS eventSourceId
FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventTypes":[]')
--eventPrecisions SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventPrecisionId ,Type AS eventPrecisionName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventPrecision
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventPrecisions'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventPrecisions":[]')
--heightWeightStandards SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS heightWeightStandardId ,Gender AS genderCode ,Height AS height ,MinDepWgt AS minDepWgt ,MaxDepWgtUnder21 AS maxDepWgtUnder21 ,MaxDepWgtUnder31 AS maxDepWgtUnder31 ,MaxDepWgtUnder36 AS maxDepWgtUnder36 ,MaxShipWgt AS maxShipWgt ,ShipWgtOver5Pct AS shipWgtOver5Pct ,ShipWgtOver10Pct AS shipWgtOver10Pct ,PriSrvMinDepWgt AS priSrvMinDepWgt ,PriSrvMaxDepWgt AS priSrvMaxDepWgt FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.HeightWeightStandard2
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('heightWeightStandards'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"heightWeightStandards":[]')
--addressTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PersonAddressTypeId AS addressTypeId ,PersonAddressType AS addressTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonAddressType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('addressTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"addressTypes":[]')
--phoneTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PersonPhoneTypeId AS phoneTypeId ,PersonPhoneType AS phoneTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhoneType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('phoneTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"phoneTypes":[]')
--emailTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PersonEmailTypeId AS emailTypeId ,ContactEmailType AS emailTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonEmailType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('emailTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"emailTypes":[]')
--priori.es SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PriorityCode AS priorityCode ,PriorityDescrip.on AS priorityName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectPriority
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('priori.es'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"priori.es":[]')
--programs SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PROGRAM_ID AS programId ,PROGRAM_CODE AS programCode ,PROGRAM_TYPE AS programTypeCode ,PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION AS programName ,INCEPTION_DATE AS incep.onDate ,STATUS AS programStatus FROM MCRISS.dbo.PROGRAM
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('programs'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"programs":[]')
--programTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PROGRAM_TYPE_CODE AS programTypeCode ,PROGRAM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION AS programTypeName FROM MCRISS.dbo.PROGRAM_TYPE
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('programTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"programTypes":[]')
--birthVeri.ca.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT BirthDocumentCode AS birthVeri.ca.onCode ,BirthDocumentDesposi.on AS birthVeri.ca.onName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.BirthDocument
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('birthVeri.ca.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"birthVeri.ca.ons":[]')
--veri.ca.onStatuses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Code AS veri.ca.onStatusCode ,Descrip.on AS veri.ca.onStatusName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Veri.ca.onStatus
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('veri.ca.onStatuses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"veri.ca.onStatuses":[]')
--educa.onProjectedTiers SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Code AS educa.onProjectedTierId ,Descrip.on AS educa.onProjectedTierName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Educa.onTier
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onProjectedTiers'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onProjectedTiers":[]')
--categories SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Code AS categoryCode ,Descrip.on AS categoryName FROM MCRISS.USMC.NWACategory
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('categories'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"categories":[]')
--examTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE AS examTypeCode ,PROFESSED_EXAM_SHORT_DESC AS examTypeShortName ,PROFESSED_EXAM_DESC AS examTypeName ,TYPE AS candidateType FROM MCRISS.dbo.PROFESSED_EXAM WHERE PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE IN ('A','E','S','T','W','I', 'F')
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('examTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"examTypes":[]')
--mediaTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT MediaTypeID AS mediaTypeId ,MediaType AS mediaTypeName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MediaType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('mediaTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"mediaTypes":[]')
--candidateDisposi.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DISPOSITION_CODE AS candidateDisposi.onCode ,STATUS_CODE AS candidateStatusCode ,DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION AS candidateDisposi.onName FROM MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = 'E'
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('candidateDisposi.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"candidateDisposi.ons":[]')
--recruiters SELECT rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID AS recruiterId , p.PERSON_ID AS personId , org.OrgUnitId AS sta.onOrgUnitId , rp.ORGANIZATION_ID AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onId , u.UserID AS userGuid , rp.rowguid AS recrui.ngPersonGuid , org.rowguid AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onGuid , u.Username AS userName , p.FIRST_NAME AS .rstName , p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME AS middleName , p.LAST_NAME AS lastName , rp.RANK_CODE AS [rank] , u.LastAc.vityDate AS lastSuccessfulLogin , org.NAME AS orgName , RIGHT(u.Dis.nguishedName, 10) AS edipi , rp.TOUR_END_DATE AS tourEndDate , u.ID AS userId INTO #recruiters FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[PERSON] p ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] org ON rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = org.[ORGANIZATION_ID] LEFT OUTER JOIN [UserMgmt].[dbo].[User] u ON u.[FirstName] = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.[LastName] = p.LAST_NAME AND u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = org.OrgUnitId WHERE ( rp.[TOUR_END_DATE] IS NULL OR rp.[TOUR_END_DATE] >= DATEADD(MONTH, -3, GETDATE()) ) AND u.FirstName IS NOT NULL AND u.LastName IS NOT NULL AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND ( u.MiddleName IS NULL OR ( u.MiddleName IS NOT NULL AND u.MiddleName = LEFT(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, 1) ) );
-- check for primary key viola.on SELECT recruiterId , COUNT(*) AS recCount INTO #idDups FROM #recruiters GROUP BY recruiterId HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT edipi , COUNT(*) AS recCount INTO #edipiDups FROM #recruiters GROUP BY edipi HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT recruiterId , MAX(userId) AS userid INTO #recuiterIdToKeep FROM #recruiters WHERE recruiterId IN ( SELECT recruiterId FROM #idDups ) GROUP BY recruiterId;
--remove duplicate recruiter id, only to keep the one with max user id DELETE FROM #recruiters FROM #recruiters r INNER JOIN #recuiterIdToKeep k ON r.recruiterId = k.recruiterId AND r.userId < k.userid;
SELECT edipi , MAX(recruiterId) AS recruiterId INTO #edipiToKeep FROM #recruiters WHERE edipi IN ( SELECT edipi FROM #edipiDups ) GROUP BY edipi;
--remove duplicate edipi, only to keep the one with max person id DELETE FROM #recruiters FROM #recruiters r INNER JOIN #edipiToKeep k ON r.edipi = k.edipi AND r.recruiterId < k.recruiterId;
SET @tempJson = ( SELECT recruiterId , personId , sta.onOrgUnitId , recrui.ngOrganiza.onId , userGuid , recrui.ngPersonGuid , recrui.ngOrganiza.onGuid , userName , .rstName , middleName , lastName , [rank] , lastSuccessfulLogin , orgName , edipi , tourEndDate FROM #recruiters
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('recruiters'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"recruiters":[]')
-- DROP TABLE DROP TABLE #idDups; DROP TABLE #edipiDups; DROP TABLE #recuiterIdToKeep; DROP TABLE #edipiToKeep; DROP TABLE #recruiters;
--medicalExamTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT MedicalExamType AS medicalExamTypeCode ,MedicalExamDesc AS medicalExamTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.MedicalExam
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('medicalExamTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"medicalExamTypes":[]')
--medicalDisposi.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT MedicalDisposi.onID AS medicalDisposi.onCode ,MedicalDisposi.onDesc AS medicalDisposi.onName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectMedicalDisposi.on
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('medicalDisposi.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"medicalDisposi.ons":[]')
--eventBene.tTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventBene.tTypeId ,Name AS eventBene.tTypeName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.EventBene.tType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventBene.tTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventBene.tTypes":[]')
--eventAppointmentOutcomes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventAppointmentOutcomeId ,Type AS eventAppointmentOutcomeName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.AppointmentOutcome
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventAppointmentOutcomes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventAppointmentOutcomes":[]')
--eventInterviewOutcomes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS eventInterviewOutcomeId ,Type AS eventInterviewOutcomeName FROM RSSOSS.USMC.InterviewOutcome
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventInterviewOutcomes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventInterviewOutcomes":[]')
--sectors SET @tempJson = ( SELECT SectorID AS sectorId ,Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onId ,SectorDesignator AS sectorDesignator ,SectorType AS sectorType FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN #Recruiter rc ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = rc.OrgGuid
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('sectors'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"sectors":[]')
--sectorZips SET @tempJson = ( SELECT msz.SectorZipId AS sectorZipId ,msz.SectorID AS sectorId ,msz.Zip AS zipCode ,msz.E.ec.veDate AS e.ec.veDate FROM
RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector ms ON msz.SectorID = ms.SectorID INNER JOIN #Recruiter rc ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = rc.OrgGuid
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('sectorZips'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"sectorZips":[]')
--visionColors SET @tempJson = ( SELECT VisionColorCode AS visionColorCode ,VisionColorDescrip.on AS visionColorDescrip.on FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.VisionColor
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('visionColors'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"visionColors":[]')
--educa.onCer..ca.onLevels SET @tempJson = ( SELECT EDUCATION_CODE AS educa.onCer..ca.onCode ,EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE AS educa.onLevelCode FROM MCRISS.dbo.EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('educa.onCer..ca.onLevels'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"educa.onCer..ca.onLevels":[]')
--consulta.onTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT Consulta.onType AS consulta.onTypeCode ,Consulta.onTypeDescrip.on AS consulta.onTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectConsulta.on
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('consulta.onTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"consulta.onTypes":[]')
--mepsOrganiza.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID AS mepsOrganiza.onCode ,MEPS_NAME AS mepsOrganiza.onName FROM MCRISS.dbo.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('mepsOrganiza.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"mepsOrganiza.ons":[]')
--careerDecisions SET @tempJson = ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '2 Year' AS careerDecisionId ,'2 Year' AS careerDecisionName UNION SELECT '4 Year' AS careerDecisionId ,'4 Year' AS careerDecisionName UNION SELECT 'Military' AS careerDecisionId ,'Military' AS careerDecisionName UNION SELECT 'Undecided' AS careerDecisionId ,'Undecided' AS careerDecisionName UNION SELECT 'Voca.onal' AS careerDecisionId ,'Voca.onal' AS careerDecisionName ) T FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('careerDecisions'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"careerDecisions":[]')
--nonWorkingDays SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS nonWorkingDayId ,Organiza.onId AS organiza.onId ,RecruiterID AS recruiterId ,[Date] AS nonWorkingDay FROM RSSOSS.USMC.NonWorkingDay nw INNER JOIN #Recruiter rc ON nw.Organiza.onId = rc.OrgGuid WHERE Date > CAST(GETDATE() AS date)
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('nonWorkingDays'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"nonWorkingDays":[]')
--highSchoolWorkingDays SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ID AS highSchoolWorkingDayId ,RecruiterID AS recruiterId ,SchoolId AS schoolGuid ,[Date] AS highSchoolWorkingDay FROM RSSOSS.USMC.HighSchoolWorkingDay wd INNER JOIN #Recruiter rc ON wd.RecruiterID = rc.Recrui.ngPersonGuid WHERE [Date] > @nowMinusOneYear
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('highSchoolWorkingDays'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"highSchoolWorkingDays":[]')
--genders SET @tempJson = ( SELECT GENDER_CODE AS genderCode ,GENDER_CODE_DESCRIPTION AS genderName FROM MCRISS.dbo.GENDER
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('genders'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"genders":[]')
--importEventStatusTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ImportEventStatusTypeId AS importEventStatusTypeId ,ImportEventStatusType AS importEventStatusTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportEventStatusType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('importEventStatusTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"importEventStatusTypes":[]')
--personImportStatuses SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ImportPersonStatusTypeId AS importPersonStatusTypeId ,ImportPersonStatusType AS importPersonStatusType FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportPersonStatusType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('personImportStatuses'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"personImportStatuses":[]')
--importTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ImportTypeId AS importTypeId ,ImportType AS importTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ImportType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('importTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"importTypes":[]')
--prospectSchoolTypes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ProspectSchoolTypeId AS prospectSchoolTypeId ,ProspectSchoolType AS prospectSchoolTypeName FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchoolType
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('prospectSchoolTypes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"prospectSchoolTypes":[]')
--dischargeReasons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT DISCHARGE_CODE AS dischargeReasonCode ,DISCHARGE_REASON AS dischargeReasonName ,DISCHARGE_TYPE AS dischargeType ,TYPE AS candidateType FROM MCRISS.dbo.DISCHARGE_REASON
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('dischargeReasons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"dischargeReasons":[]')
--recrui.ngOrganiza.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onId ,NAME AS recrui.ngOrganiza.onName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('recrui.ngOrganiza.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"recrui.ngOrganiza.ons":[]')
--majors SET @tempJson = ( SELECT CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_CODE AS majorCode ,CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR_DESCRIPT AS majorName FROM MCRISS.dbo.CIV_EDUCATION_MAJOR
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('majors'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"majors":[]')
--objec.veWeeks SET @tempJson = ( SELECT ow.ID AS objec.veWeekId ,ow.OrgID AS orgId ,ow.[Year] AS [year] ,ow.[Month] AS [month] ,ow.StartDate AS startDate ,ow.EndDate AS endDate FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Objec.veWeek ow INNER JOIN #Recruiter rc ON ow.OrgID = rc.ORGANIZATION_ID
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('objec.veWeeks'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"objec.veWeeks":[]')
--trainingOrganiza.ons SET @tempJson = ( SELECT TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID AS trainingOrganiza.onId ,NAME AS trainingOrganiza.onName FROM MCRISS.dbo.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION WHERE [TYPE] = 'E'
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('trainingOrganiza.ons'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"trainingOrganiza.ons":[]')
SET @result = '{' + @result + '}'
SELECT @result
DROP TABLE #Recruiter
